articles.title: This Common Activity Could Be Wreaking Havoc on Your Health, Even if You Are Young and Exercise - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New research reveals that prolonged sitting significantly increases the risk of heart disease and obesity, even in young, active adults. Examining over 1,000 individuals with an average age of 33, researchers found that sitting for eight or more hours daily r…
articles.content: Prolonged sitting harms young adults’ health, increasing BMI and cholesterol risks. Current exercise guidelines fall short, but doubling exercise or incorporating vigorous activity significantly redu… [+5463 chars]
